1.title: Tell me a fact

website.about:
NextWebUI
The modern, high-performance chat UI based on Next.js.

View on

5-14b-chat-awq.description: Powerful Qwen model (7.5K Token Max Context)

5-7b-chat-awq.description: Smaller, faster, lower cost Qwen model (20K Token Max Context)

8b-chat.description: Smaller, Low-coster Qwen model with longer context support (32K Token Max Context)

gpt-oss-120b.description: Powerful OpenAI open-source model capable of solving most tasks (128K Token Max Context)

gpt-oss-20b.description: Powerful OpenAI open-source models capable of solving most everyday tasks (128K Token Max Context)

deepseek-r1-32b.description: DeepSeek open-source model with thinking capabilities, capable of solving most everyday tasks (80K Token Max Context)

5-coder-32b-instruct.description: Qwen open-source model that is good at code editing and can solve most programming tasks (32K Token Max Context)

grok-2-vision.description: Grok model with vision capabilities (32K Token Max Context)

grok-2.description: Powerful Grok model (128K Token Max Context)

grok-3-mini-beta.description: Grok model with thinking function (128K Token Max Context)

errors.some_thing_wrong: Something went wrong, please try again later.
errors.database_query_error: An error occurred while executing database query.

bad_request.api: Request cannot be processed, please check your input and try again.
bad_request.document: Requests to create or update documents are invalid. Please check your input and try again.

unauthorized.auth: Before proceeding, you need to login.
unauthorized.chat: You need to be logged in to view this chat. Please login and try again.
unauthorized.document: You need to be logged in to view this document. Please login and try again.

invalidtoken.auth: The session is invalid and you need to login again.

rate_limit.chat: You've exceeded the maximum number of messages for the day. Please try again later.

not_found.chat: Requested chat was not found. Please check the chat ID and try again.
not_found.document: The requested document was not found. Please check the document ID and try again.

forbidden.chat: This chat belongs to another user. Please check the chat ID and try again.
forbidden.document: This document belongs to another user. Please check the document ID and try again.

offline.chat: We are having trouble sending your message. Please check your internet connection and try again.

forbidden.auth: Your account does not have access to this feature.
